name: Aquatic Animals - An educational Ocean puzzle for toddlers and kids
name_original: Aquatic Animals - An educational Ocean puzzle for toddlers and kids
description:
Your Child is about to undertake a journey through the world of arquartic animals and ocean life.

In the course of up to 15 scenarios, your Child will playfully get to know everything about aquartic animals, ocean life and will thus train his- or her- gift of imagination, intellect, skills and combination capacities.
